entry.title: yevhenlisovenko/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: binoymanoj/TabStacker: TabStacker is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps you organize your online world by creating custom bookmark collections. Unlike traditional browser bookmarks, TabStacker lets you categorize websites into personalized groups.

entry.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

entry.title: ethhix/GameScanner: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
entry.content: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.

entry.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
entry.content: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
